lastfm.summary: Appearing on her standout 1970 LP, Ptah, The El Daoud, “Turiya And Ramakrishna” is a ballad that showcases Alice Coltrane‘s unique talents as a pianist. With the backbone of the track laid down by drummer Ben Riley and especially bassist Ron Carter, who puts in an unconventionally muscular performance here, Coltrane really has the opportunity to stretch out on the piano here, playing overlapping melodic lines and tapping into harmonic beauty. Read more on Last.fm.
lastfm.title: Turiya & Ramakrishna
